content: Hi, everyone. This is somewhat late-breaking news. The HL7 Working Group Meeting is happening this week, and we won't be having our usual 11:00 AM ET IPS call tomorrow (Wednesday). However, for those who are attending the WGM (everyone else gets a week off!) we have now scheduled a quarter for an IPS update and ongoing discussion and further work in the Patient Care session during Q4 tomorrow (3:30 - 5:00 PM EDT / 19:30 - 21:00 UTC). Please join if you can (and we'll plan to catch everyone else up next week)!

For the discussion today you can find in the confluence page
(https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PC/CDA+IPS+-+items+ready+for+PC+approval)
the list of the CDA IPS jira items that are ready for approval
